HPI 987 Lancia Stratos Yellow

This one looks like a respray of the white version which is kind of a mash-up of the green version (wheels) and blue version (body style). Until I compared these photos I never realized there was such a significant difference in the size of the extended rear wheel arches compared to the green model.
